1.「チャオー！| バジェオじいさんの家へ ようこそー！: Ciao! Welcome to Grandpa Bajeo's house!

2.「……って お前さん 見ない顔じゃな。| もしや わしの技師としてのウデを見込ん: You don't look familiar to me. Did you come to|offer me a job because of my skill as an|engineer?

3.「じゃが 残念ー！ ワシは技師を辞めて| 隠居生活を 満喫チューなのじゃ！| 仕: But alas!　I'm a retired engineer enjoying my|retirement! If you want to talk about work, no|thanks.

4.「……な なにっ？ お前さん| エイブラム船長の使いで来たじゃとっ！？: What?　You're here on Captain Abram's errand!

5.「ふ…ふんっ！ エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん: Hmph... hmph!　I don't know Abram! I said I|don't know Abram!

6.バジェオに|技師の工具かばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Bajeo the Engineer's Toolbag?<yesno><close>

7.「もう エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん！！: I don't even know who Abram is! I said I don't|know Abram!

9.「これは…… ワシの仕事道具……！| しかも なんじゃ？ 壊れたスパナの代わりに: This... is my work tool. What's more, what is|it?　A High-Tech Wrench in place of the broken|one?

10.「くっ！ エイブラムめ！ なんで| ワシの愛用のスパナを 取り替えたんじゃ！？|: Damn!　Abram!　Why did you replace my beloved|wrench? You've made it so high-tech!

11.「ワシが あのスパナに| どれほどの愛着を持っていたか！ 壊れたら直し| 古さな: How much I loved that wrench!　I used to fix it|when it broke, loving its old-fashioned|goodness!

15.「勝手なことをするな……か。| そう言えば アイツも ケンカした時| 同じこと言: Don't do anything selfish...? Come to think of|it, he said the same thing when we had a|fight...

16.「……そうか。| アイツは こんな気持ちじゃったのか。: I see. So this is how he felt.

18.「エイブラムめ こしゃくなマネを！| オーケー オーケー！ ワシも 悪かったわ！: Abram, you're such a pussy! Okay, okay,|okay!　I'm sorry, I'm sorry too! It was me who|did it in the first place!

19.「そう……。ワシは あのエイブラムが| 何より愛する グランドタイタス号の心臓部: Yes... I've messed with the heart of the Grand|Titus, the power unit that Abram loves more|than anything else.

20.「修理の時…… ワシは ヤツのためを思い| あの船が 迷いの霧の嵐にも耐えられる:
When it came time for repairs, I did him a|favor by developing and installing a state-of-|the-art powerplant that would allow that ship|
|to withstand the foggy storms of the stray.

21.「なのに アイツときたら 船の最大の| ミリョクである 武骨で味わいのある動力装:
And then he gets mad at me for turning the|ship's most important feature, its rugged and|tasteful power unit, into a hi-tech piece of|
|machinery without his permission!

22.「あんときは なんて了見のせまいヤツじゃ！ と| 怒りにまかせ 工具かばんをほっ:
I was so angry at that time, I left my tool|bag behind and went down to the ship.　I was so|angry that I left my tool bag behind and went|
|off the ship...

23.「同じことをされて ワシもわかった。| よかれと思ってやったことが| 相手を怒ら:
I also understood after the same thing was|done to me. I also learned that what you do|for the best of your intentions may offend the|
|other person.

24.「まあ これで おあいこじゃ！| かばんを届けてくれたのは 技師を続けろという|: Well, now we're even! I guess the bag was|Abram's way of telling you to keep on being a|clocksmith.

25.「さて……まずは この 技師の工具かばんで| たまった仕事を片付けることから 始: Well...let's start by cleaning up the work|that has accumulated in this Engineer's|Toolbag. Hmm?　Speaking of which...

26.「グランゼドーラ城の例の装置も そろそろ……。| おっと！ すまん こっちの話じ: I think it's time to get that device at Gran|Zedora Castle... Oops!　Sorry, I was talking|about us. Well, give my regards to Abram!

27.「チャオー！| 天才技師バジェオの家に ようこそー！: Ciao! Welcome to the home of the genius|engineer Bajeo!

28.「……っと お前さんか。| いつぞやは 世話になったのう。: Oh, it's you, isn't it? You're the one who|took care of me the other day.

29.「エイブラムのヤツは 相変わらず素直じゃなくて| わざわざ スパナを交換して 届: Abram, as usual, was not so straightforward|and went to the trouble of replacing the|spanner and delivering it to me...

30.「工具が戻ってきて 正直 助かった。| グランゼドーラ城の あの装置も そろそろ:
I'm glad I got my tools back, to be honest. It|was about time we got that equipment back at|Gran Zedora Castle in need of some|
|maintenance!

31.「さすがは エイブラム！| バッチリ グッドな タイミングじゃったぞい！| ……: That's what I'm talking about, Abram!|Perfectly timed, good timing! Well, give my|regards to Abram!
